const BaseCompExpand_1 = require("../BaseCompExpand");
const csharp_1 = require("csharp");
//刚体
class RigidbodyExpand extends BaseCompExpand_1.default {
    set canCollideWith(value) {
    }
    set collisionGroup(value) {
        this.__owner.__cobject.layer = value;
    }
    set isKinematic(value) {
        this.__comp.isKinematic = value;
    }
    //给与冲量
    applyImpulse(vec3) {
        this.__comp.AddForce(vec3.x, vec3.y, vec3.z, csharp_1.UnityEngine.ForceMode.Impulse);
    }
    set mass(value) {
        this.__comp.mass = value;
    }
    set friction(value) {
        // this.__comp.drag = value;
    }
    set rollingFriction(value) {
        // this.__comp.angularDrag =value;
    }
    set linearDamping(value) {
        this.__comp.drag = value;
    }
    set angularDamping(value) {
        this.__comp.angularDrag = value;
    }
}
exports.default = RigidbodyExpand;
